name: Cherry Juice Merino Tweed Worsted Yarn - Moon Stone Farm
description:
The tweed effect is more noticeable in some colors than in others. There is enough yarn in this skein to knit a hat and have some left over.

This 100 gram skein has approximately 181 yards. It is 100% merino. One ply is super wash, the other 2 are pure merino. This yarn may felt due to the low amount of super wash in it. Gauge is 4 sts per inch on US10/6mm knitting needles. I always recommend hand washing any hand knit or crocheted items.

Color may vary from what you see on your computer monitor

name: Neon Lime Silk Sock Yarn - Moon Stone Farm
description:
This fingering weight merino and silk yarn will make gorgeous socks, mittens, or anything else for that matter.

This 100 gram skein has 440 yards. It is 70% merino and 30% silk. Gauge is 7-8 sts per inch on #1-3 knitting needles. This yarn can felt, so hand wash only! Wouldnâ€™t want to ruin that beautiful project you just finished. Lay flat to dry.

Color may vary from what you see on your computer monitor

description:
The tweed effect is more noticeable in some colors than in others. This 100 gram skein has approximately 438 yards. It is 100% merino. One ply is super wash, the other 2 are pure merino. name: Sunflower Yellow Merino Superwash Sock Yarn - Moon Stone Farm
description:
Bright yellow yarn to remind you of the sunflowers of late summer and early fall. This yarn will be great for your project!

This fingering weight super wash merino yarn would make beautiful pair of socks or other accessories. The blend makes a soft yarn that would also be great for mittens, gloves, hats, scarves, baby items or even a small shawl.

This 100 gram skein has approximately 490 yards. It is 100% super wash merino. Gauge is 7-8 sts per inch on #1-3 knitting needles. It is machine washable, but I always recommend hand washing any hand knit or crocheted items.

Color may vary from what you see on your computer monitor.

name: Summer Sky Blue Merino Nylon 2-Ply Sock Yarn - Moon Stone Farm
description:
This 2-ply, fingering weight yarn is great for mittens, socks, shawls, and other accessories. It is wonderfully soft and springy.

This 100 gram skein has approximately 400 yards. It is 80% super wash merino and 20% nylon. Gauge is 7-8 sts per inch on #1-3 knitting needles. It is machine washable, but I always recommend hand washing any hand knit or crocheted items.

Color may vary from what you see on your computer monitor
